text: Alien Mom, Alien Dad () is a South Korean television entertainment program, where celebrities, who are known for their unique personalities, show their daily lives which their children respond and react to. ==Broadcasting period== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Broadcasting period !! Airtime !!
